info.author: 4teamwork AG
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

Bundles the jquery.treeview plugin to hide and show branches of a tree
and provides a view to integrate it with the Plone navigation tree.

Links
=====

* Main github project repository: https://github.com/4teamwork/ftw.treeview
* Issue tracker: https://github.com/4teamwork/ftw.treeview/issues

Copyright
---------

This package is copyright by `4teamwork <http://www.4teamwork.ch/>`_.

``ftw.treeview`` is licensed under GNU General Public License.

Changelog
=========

1.2.0 (2014-10-24)
------------------

- Add uninstall profile.
  [jone]


1.1.1 (2014-07-28)
------------------

- Disable caching for Treeview results.
  [phgross]


1.1 (2014-06-05)
----------------

- Added `call` method to the treeview, to allow accessing per ajax.
  [phgross]

- Include server hostname in TreeView cache-key in order to make
  sure we don't break virtual hosting.
  [lgraf]

- Implemented per-user caching for TreeView results.
  [lgraf]


1.0.3 (2014-02-17)
------------------

- Moved package to GitHub.
  [lknoepfel]


1.0.2 (2012-11-28)
------------------

- Adjust javscripts: Use $ instead of deprecated jq.
  [phgross]


1.0.1 (2012-02-24)
------------------

- Add support for titles in alternative languages. Just add metadata to the
  catalog with name "title_{preferred language code}".
  [jone]


1.0 (2011-11-17)
----------------

- final release
info.name: ftw.treeview
info.summary: Adds a navigation treeview widget to plone.

Introduction

Bundles the jquery.treeview plugin to hide and show branches of a tree and provides a view to integrate it with the Plone navigation tree.

Links

  • Main github project repository: https://github.com/4teamwork/ftw.treeview
  • Issue tracker: https://github.com/4teamwork/ftw.treeview/issues

Copyright

This package is copyright by 4teamwork.

ftw.treeview is licensed under GNU General Public License.

Changelog

1.2.0 (2014-10-24)

  • Add uninstall profile. [jone]

1.1.1 (2014-07-28)

  • Disable caching for Treeview results. [phgross]

1.1 (2014-06-05)

  • Added call method to the treeview, to allow accessing per ajax. [phgross]
  • Include server hostname in TreeView cache-key in order to make sure we don’t break virtual hosting. [lgraf]
  • Implemented per-user caching for TreeView results. [lgraf]

1.0.3 (2014-02-17)

  • Moved package to GitHub. [lknoepfel]

1.0.2 (2012-11-28)

  • Adjust javscripts: Use $ instead of deprecated jq. [phgross]

1.0.1 (2012-02-24)

  • Add support for titles in alternative languages. Just add metadata to the catalog with name “title_{preferred language code}”. [jone]

1.0 (2011-11-17)

  • final release
